Regards got mail for internship - IIC - Training and Placement - IITM-DSA














































































IITM-DSA




Regards got mail for internship






IIC - Training and Placement







operational


















23f3003030





                    May 27, 2025,  7:46am
                  

1



I got mail yesterday regards online internship where they are saying 1 month training and 1 month internship asking amount 4k
I just want to confir whete its scam or genuine
Screenshot_20250527-131213_Gmail1080×2340 270 KB




2 Likes



Got a mail regarding internship







Prince_iitm



                    May 27, 2025,  7:55am
                  

2



Never pay for internship !!!




2 Likes





H.BHASKAR_934



                    May 27, 2025,  8:12am
                  

3



Here is a master list of such fake companies and mails which students usually get through mails.:



Beware of fake internship providers IIC - Training and Placement


    Once you receive your student email ID, you’ll likely start receiving numerous emails about internships from various EdTech companies claiming partnerships with MNCs like Wipro, Microsoft, etc, or institutions like IIT Guwahati. These emails often have a yellow “External” tag and, upon closer inspection, are filled with grammatical and presentation errors. 
The companies these EdTech providers mention do not collaborate with them and have their own processes for shortlisting internship candidate…
  


So never try to get in them unless it is from official iitm domain email or from IIC




2 Likes





25f1002112



                    June 2, 2025, 12:58pm
                  

4



There are all kinds of scam emails - some from “Wipro” “Accenture” for internship opportunity - the same 1 month + 1 month, saying pay Rs 4,200 now and get 15,000 in the second month on the project work. Then there are scam emails from individuals offering classes for clearing Exam 1, Exam 2 etc of various courses. NONE of these are officially linked to IITM.
However, my question is how on earth did these fraud start-up companies/individuals get access to IITM student official emails?? This has to be the work of people inside of IITM.
I have written to support, portal support and IIC about this matter.
Let us do our part of NOT supporting these fraud outside organizations - this EdTech start-up space is simply a hoax, IMO.




1 Like





25f1002112



                    June 2, 2025,  2:23pm
                  

5



The specific issue with the internship with Wipro - is that it is NOT being facilitated by Wipro. A company called Internsforge created the “platform” to enrol, they then created another platform to pay the fees, and then they claim that this is a Wipro internship and that 57 students of IITM have enrolled - to lend an air of credibility to this “system”.
The same middle-men that DTC start-ups sought to eliminate, are being created by these so-called “Ed-Tech” players.




1 Like





AryanK




                    June 5, 2025,  2:01pm
                  

6



I got an email too, is this legit?
Screenshot_2025-06-05-19-30-26-251_com.google.android.gm1080×2400 148 KB




1 Like





24f3000936



                    June 5, 2025,  2:04pm
                  

7



Don’t fall in this trap of fraudsters. To identity is this authentic or not you can simply see a yellow colour box where in “external” is written, so you may make out that it is a fake intership mail.




1 Like





AryanK



                    June 5, 2025,  2:06pm
                  

8



Thank you for letting me know.










24f3000936



                    June 5, 2025,  2:12pm
                  

9



Your most welcome !!




1 Like





Ajmal_141



                    June 5, 2025,  3:43pm
                  

10



Yes brother I got that mail too..how the heck out emails are exposed










25f1002112



                    June 5, 2025,  6:01pm
                  

11



(post deleted by author)
